entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. Rain showers or flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 14.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
